function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global pandemic of COVID-19","Impact":"Severe impacts on human life and healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing, school and workplace closures, and movement restrictions","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccine development","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, essential workers","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations, essential service providers"},{"Description":"Financial impacts on waste and wastewater industries","Impact":"Significant financial losses","Mitigation":"Support for revenue reduction and expense increase","Technologies":"Digital solutions for waste management, remote monitoring systems for wastewater treatment plants","People":"Workers in waste and wastewater industries","Owner":"Government, waste management organizations"}]}
